ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Peter D. Lowry ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. PETER D. LOWRY, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of British Columbia, effective June 30, 2018.
